txt.en:
An evil Orc-leader named Rípmaush has set himself upon the Thane's seat in the Mead Hall of Marton, and now mockingly titles himself Thane.

His presence is an insult to the real Thane of Marton.

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This quest is intended to be challenging.</rgb>
Rípmaush can be found in the Mead Hall of Marton, sitting upon the Thane's chair and surrounded by his minions.\n\nYou should dethrone Thane Rípmaush.
An evil Orc-leader named Rípmaush has set himself upon the Thane's seat in the Mead Hall of Marton, and now mockingly titles himself Thane.
Rípmaush has been removed from the Thane's chair of Marton's Mead Hall.
Rípmaush has been removed from the Thane's chair of Marton's Mead Hall.
Rípmaush can be found in the Mead Hall of Marton, sitting upon the Thane's chair and surrounded by his minions.\n\nYou should dethrone Rípmaush, the false Thane.
